title: Wage and salary of U.S. employees , by industry 2018
yAxis: Wage and salary in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wage and salary in U.S. dollars for 22 number of Industrys.
The Wage and salary in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Industry Management of companies and enterprises and lowest at Industry Accommodation and food services.
The Wage and salary in U.S. dollars of Industry Management of companies and enterprises is 4.3% larger than the minimum value at Accommodation and food services.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wage and salary in U.S. dollars for 22 number of Industrys.
Industry Management of companies and enterprises has the highest Wage and salary in U.S. dollars and Accommodation and food services has the lowest Wage and salary in U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wage and salary in U.S. dollars for 22 number of Industrys.
The Wage and salary in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Industry Management of companies and enterprises and lowest at Industry Accommodation and food services.
The Wage and salary in U.S. dollars of Industry Management of companies and enterprises is 4.3% larger than the minimum value at Accommodation and food services.
max_summary: This bar chart has 22 columns on the x axis representing Industry, and Wage and salary in U.S. dollars in each Industry on the y axis.

The maximum Wage and salary in U.S. dollars 130777.0 is found at Industry Management of companies and enterprises and the minimum is found at Accommodation and food services where Industry is 30403.0.
Industry Information has the second highest value for Wage and salary in U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 100374.0 between the maximum Industry Management of companies and enterprises and minimum Industry Accommodation and food services.

Industry Management of companies and enterprises is higher than any other Industrys with value 130777.0, followed by Information, and Utilities. Down to Industry Accommodation and food services with the lowest value 30403.0.
The Industry Management of companies and enterprises has 1.82 times more Wage and salary in U.S. dollars than average.
